name: d3-annotate
description: Interactively and programmatically add, edit, move and save SVG chart annotations

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-drag:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-selection-multi:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-annotate.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && echo 'skipping: ./node_modules/.bin/babel build/d3-annotate.js -o build/d3-annotate-es5.js && uglifyjs build/d3-annotate-es5.js -c -m -o build/d3-annotate.min.js'
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-annotate.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-annotate.js build/d3-annotate.min.js
